code: library(ComprehensivePipelineUtils) #> 载入需要的程辑包：tidyverse #> ── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ── #> ✔ dplyr     1.1.4     ✔ readr     2.1.5 #> ✔ forcats   1.0.0     ✔ stringr   1.5.1 #> ✔ ggplot2   3.5.1     ✔ tibble    3.2.1 #> ✔ lubridate 1.9.3     ✔ tidyr     1.3.1 #> ✔ purrr     1.0.2      #> ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── #> ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() #> ✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag() #> ℹ Use the conflicted package (<http://conflicted.r-lib.org/>) to force all conflicts to become errors ## basic example code summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00
